Type IBehaviorConfig

Namespace Machine.Fakes

A BehaviorConfig is a simple way to modularize the configuration of fakes in an WithSubject<TSubject, TFakeEngine>. Implementing this interface enables you to participate in the setup and cleanup stages of a specification without having to derive from it.

Methods

  • CleanUp
  • EstablishContext

Public instance methods

void CleanUp(object subject)

Is called after the specification has executed and can be used for further cleanup.
Parameters
object subject

The subject that was used in the spec.

void EstablishContext(IFakeAccessor fakeAccessor)

Is called when the specification is establishing the context.
Parameters
IFakeAccessor fakeAccessor

Gives access to creating, accessing and configuring fakes inside the specifications subject.

Based on v0.2.0.6 of Machine.Fakes
